Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseController
controller.StudentController
public class StudentController extends BaseController
Controller exposing student-facing operations required by the UI boundaries.

This controller provides all student-specific functionality including:

  • Browsing and filtering eligible internships
  • Applying to internships with application cap enforcement
  • Managing applications (viewing, accepting offers, withdrawing)
  • Tracking application status and placement confirmation
  • Submitting and tracking withdrawal requests
The controller enforces business rules such as:
  • Student eligibility based on academic level and internship requirements
  • Application caps and limits
  • Ownership validation for all student operations
  • Status-based restrictions on operations
  • Automatic withdrawal of other applications upon offer acceptance

    • StudentController

      public StudentController(StudentRepository students, InternshipRepository internships, ApplicationRepository applications, WithdrawalRequestRepository withdrawals)
      Constructs a StudentController wired to the required repositories.
      Parameters:
      students - the student repository for student data operations
      internships - the internship repository for internship data operations
      applications - the application repository for application data operations
      withdrawals - the withdrawal request repository for withdrawal operations

  • Method Details

    • getStudent

      public Student getStudent(String studentId)
      Retrieves a student by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Student entity with the specified ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no student is found with the given ID

    • viewEligibleInternships

      public List<Internship> viewEligibleInternships(String studentId)
      Returns internships eligible for the student based on current date and eligibility criteria.

      An internship is considered eligible if it:

      • Is currently open for applications (based on open/close dates)
      • Is visible to students
      • Matches the student's academic level requirements
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      a list of internships eligible for the student to apply to, or an empty list if no eligible internships exist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is not found

    • viewFilteredInternships

      public List<Internship> viewFilteredInternships(String studentId, String major, InternshipLevel level, String companyName)
      Returns internships filtered by additional criteria from the student's eligible internships.

      Applies additional filters to the student's eligible internships based on:

      • Preferred major (case-insensitive match)
      • Internship level (exact match)
      • Company name (case-insensitive match)
      Null filter parameters are ignored (no filtering applied for that criterion).
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      major - the preferred major to filter by, or null for no major filtering
      level - the internship level to filter by, or null for no level filtering
      companyName - the company name to filter by, or null for no company filtering
      Returns:
      a list of filtered internships that match all specified criteria, or an empty list if no matching internships exist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is not found

    • applyForInternship

      public String applyForInternship(String studentId, String internshipId)
      Creates an application for a student to an internship.

      Validates that:

      • The student hasn't already applied to this internship
      • The student is eligible to apply (level, application caps, etc.)
      • The internship is open and visible
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the applying student
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship to apply to
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the created application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student or internship is not found
      IllegalStateException - if the student has already applied to this internship, or if the student cannot apply due to eligibility or cap restrictions

    • confirmAcceptance

      public void confirmAcceptance(String studentId, String applicationId)
      Confirms a student's acceptance of an internship offer.

      This operation:

      • Reserves a slot in the internship
      • Automatically withdraws all other active applications
      • Marks the application as accepted by the student
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the application to accept
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the application is not found
      SecurityException - if the student attempts to accept another student's application
      IllegalStateException - if the application is not in SUCCESSFUL status, or if the offer has already been accepted

    • requestWithdrawal

      public String requestWithdrawal(String studentId, String applicationId, String reason)
      Creates a withdrawal request for a student's application.

      Withdrawal requests require staff approval before the application is officially withdrawn.

      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the application to withdraw
      reason - the reason for withdrawal (cannot be null or empty)
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the created withdrawal request
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the application is not found, or if the reason is null or empty
      SecurityException - if the student attempts to withdraw another student's application
      IllegalStateException - if there is already a pending withdrawal request for this application

    • viewMyApplications

      public List<InternshipApplication> viewMyApplications(String studentId)
      Fetches all applications submitted by the student with internship details attached.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      a list of the student's applications with populated internship details, or an empty list if the student has no applications
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is not found

    • viewMyWithdrawalRequests

      public List<WithdrawalRequest> viewMyWithdrawalRequests(String studentId)
      Retrieves all withdrawal requests created by the student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      a list of withdrawal requests submitted by the student, or an empty list if the student has no withdrawal requests
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is not found

    • getApplication

      public InternshipApplication getApplication(String studentId, String applicationId)
      Retrieves a specific application ensuring the requesting student owns it.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the application to retrieve
      Returns:
      the application with the specified ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the application is not found
      SecurityException - if the application does not belong to the student

    • canApplyMore

      public boolean canApplyMore(String studentId)
      Checks whether the student can submit another application based on application caps.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      true if the student is below the application cap and can apply to more internships, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is not found

    • getActiveApplicationCount

      public int getActiveApplicationCount(String studentId)
      Returns the count of active applications that count toward the application cap.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      the number of active applications submitted by the student
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is not found

    • hasConfirmedPlacement

      public boolean hasConfirmedPlacement(String studentId)
      Checks whether the student has a confirmed placement (accepted offer).
      Parameters:
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      true if the student has accepted an offer for an internship, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is not found
